Detailed Description

Manager class for storing multiple device profiles (a.k.a SEP data).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Parameters
[in]profilesList of profiles.

IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::ProfileManager ( String^  sProfilesJson)

Constructor for profile manager that reads in a profile json string.

Parameters
[in]sProfilesJsonA string containing the profile json string. This is sensitive data that contains keys validating this device.

◆ GetDeviceProfileForKeyId()

DeviceProfile IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::GetDeviceProfileForKeyId ( String ^  msKeyId)

Determine which device profile is associated with the provided key ID.

Parameters
[in]msKeyIdThe key ID.
Returns
Returns the device profile associated with the provided key ID. If no device profile is found for the key, then NULL is returned.

◆ loadFromJson()

void IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::loadFromJson ( String^  sProfileJson)

Loads all profiles from json data.

Parameters
[in]sProfileJsonA string containing json profile data.

Profiles are senstive data. If an error occurs, an SdkException will be thrown.

◆ LoadProfiles() [1/2]

void IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::LoadProfiles ( )

Load device profiles using the default profile persistor.

Attempts to load device profiles using the default profile persistor.

This is a convenience function and is equivalent to calling Agent::LoadProfiles(DeviceProfilePersistor^).

Throws and SdkException on error.

See also
ProfileManager::LoadProfiles(DeviceProfilePersistor^)

◆ LoadProfiles() [2/2]

void IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::LoadProfiles ( DeviceProfilePersistor ^  persistor)

Load device profiles using the specified profile persistor.

Parameters
[in]persistorThe device profile persistor.

Attempts to load device profiles using the specified profile persistor.

If loading is successful, all existing profiles associated with the agent will be discarded in favor of the newly loaded profiles. The active profile provided by the persistor will replace the previous active profile (if any). It is also possible that the persistor does not provide an active profile, in which case the agent object will be left without an active profile.

If loading is not successful, then no changes are made to the state of the agent.

Throws and SdkException on error.

See also
ProfileManager::LoadProfiles()

◆ RemoveProfile()

bool IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::RemoveProfile ( String^  msDeviceId)

Remove a device profile from the agent device profile collection.

Parameters
[in]msDeviceIdThe device ID of the profile.
Returns
Returns true if the profile was found. Returns false if the profile was not found.

◆ SaveProfiles() [1/2]

void IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::SaveProfiles ( )

Save device profiles using the default profile persistor.

Attempts to save device profiles using the default profile persistor. This is a convenience function and is equivalent to calling Agent::SaveProfiles(DeviceProfilePersistor^).

Throws and SdkException on error.

See also
ProfileManager::SaveProfiles(DeviceProfilePersistor^)

Attempts to save device profiles using the specified profile persistor.

Throws and SdkException on error.

◆ saveToJson()

String IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::saveToJson ( )

Saves all profiles into an unencrypted json ISCryptoString.

Returns
An ISCryptoString containing the profile data as a json string.

◆ SetActiveProfileById()

bool IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::SetActiveProfileById ( String^  msDeviceId)

Set the current device profile of the agent.

Parameters
[in]msDeviceIdThe device ID of the profile to become active.
Returns
Returns true if the profile was found. Returns false if the profile was not found.

Property Documentation

◆ ActiveProfile

DeviceProfile^ IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::ActiveProfile
get

Get the current device profile of the agent.

Returns
Returns the active device profile object. If no active profile is set, then the object is unitialized and calling DeviceProfile::IsLoaded() on the object will return false. You can also call Agent::HasActiveProfile() to determine if there is an active profile.
See also
Agent::HasActiveProfile(), AgentDeviceProfile::IsLoaded()

◆ AllProfiles

List< DeviceProfile^>^ IonicSecurity::SDK::ProfileManager::AllProfiles
getset

All available device profiles.

Setting this property replaces all previous profiles (if any). The previous active profile (if any) will be retained if it exists in the provided profiles.
